Reading alone will not assist you in developing subtle energy skills; it will only provide the conceptual foundations. The exercises must be used and practiced to develop profi ciency. We cannot stress enough the importance of the times that now approach you, as you move into the 21st century. It is our hope that you will comprehend the significance of your approaching ascen- sion opportunity and begin to take action now, to ensure your placement within your desired future destination. For your convenience we shall now offer you a brief summary of the ascension schedule and related subjects cov- ered in these writings. 232
